ygData.subject: Prophocies
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at Gabriel and then to the hologram.  She had no reason to doubt him.  He had some proof in the hologram. He was sitting there, telling her it

::KitKat::

She looked at Gabriel and then to the hologram.  She had no reason to 
doubt him.  He had some proof in the hologram. He was sitting there, 
telling her it was her destiny to crush the allience and unite the 
preds. But with Destructor? She wondered what happened to Drillbit. 
Did he get killed? Did something happen to Drillbit that caused him 
to not make it into the future? She got worried and looked at 
Gabriel. She had to ask. Perhaps there was a way to prevent his 
death. 
"You mentionted that Destructor and I bring the preds together after 
the Allience was crushed. What happened to Drillbit? Please tell me. 
I must know. What happens to Drillbit?"
